mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3

mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 mercury each day.

blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with First Aid Tents.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

workshop.description: The Healers' Guild boosts your First Aid Tents (+50 Health, +25 Power, ability to revive healed creatures).
workshop.name: The Healers' Guild

horde1.description: The Swarm increases Wadjets production by 4 per week.
horde1.name: Swarm

horde1Upgr.description: The Swarm increases Wadjets production by 4 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Swarm

special1.description: The Idol gives every visiting hero 1000 experience points.
special1.name: Idol

rewards.message: A visit to the Idol teaches you many new skills

horde2.description: The Water Mill increases Camel Riders production by 3 per week.
horde2.name: Water Mill

horde2Upgr.description: The Water Mill increases Desert Warriors production by 3 per week.
horde2Upgr.name: Water Mill

special3.description: The Treasury earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.
special3.name: Treasury

grail.description: The presence of the Simoom increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and increases speed of defending units by 40% during the siege.
grail.name: Simoom

dwellingLvl1.description: The Settlement allows you to recruit Whippers.
dwellingLvl1.name: Settlement

dwellingLvl2.description: The Wadjet Nests allow you to recruit Wadjets.
dwellingLvl2.name: Wadjet Nests

dwellingLvl3.description: The Desert Tent allows you to recruit Camel Riders.
dwellingLvl3.name: Desert Tent

dwellingLvl4.description: The Altar of Goddess allows you to recruit Priestesses.
dwellingLvl4.name: Altar of Goddess

dwellingLvl5.description: The Cave of Fear allows you to recruit Ammuts.
dwellingLvl5.name: Cave of Fear

dwellingLvl6.description: The Sphinx Barracks allow you to recruit Sphinxes.
dwellingLvl6.name: Sphinx Barracks

dwellingLvl7.description: The Ancient Tomb allows you to recruit Anubians.
dwellingLvl7.name: Ancient Tomb

dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Upg. Settlement allows you to recruit Overseers.
dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Settlement

dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Upg. Wadjet Nests allow you to recruit Venomous Wadjets.
dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Wadjet Nests

dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Upg. Desert Tent allows you to recruit Desert Warriors.
dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Desert Tent

dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Upg. Altar of Goddess allows you to recruit High Priestesses.
dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Altar of Goddess

dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Upg. Cave of Fear allows you to recruit Devouring Ammuts.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Cave of Fear

dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Upg. Sphinx Barracks allow you to recruit Sphinx Oracles.
dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Sphinx Barracks

dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Upg. Ancient Tomb allows you to recruit Divine Anubians.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Ancient Tomb
